mapper.insert: insert into menulist (id, authName, description, children) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{authname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.bysj.logistics.manage.handle.ListToVarcharTypeHandler})

insert into menulist
id,
authName,
description,
children,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{authname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{children,jdbcType=VARCHAR,,typeHandler=com.bysj.logistics.manage.handle.ListToVarcharTypeHandler},
mapper.update:
update menulist
authName = #{authname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
children = #{children,jdbcType=VARCHAR,typeHandler=com.bysj.logistics.manage.handle.ListToVarcharTypeHandler},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
